greeting: Keeping watch over a city this size is no easy task.

name: Apothecary

name: Tailor

name: Craftsman

name: Wizard Trainer Kung

name: Banker

name: Teleport Master

name: Chiao the Archer

name: Celestial Recluse

greeting: If you can't get the rhythm, then don't even try singing to the revenants.

name: Old Man Lin
greeting: All that you see before you was caused by war. Now it seems we will need another war to fix it.

name: Fisherman
greeting: Giant Piranhas really make seafaring troublesome.

name: Guard
greeting: I have talent, but no opportunity to use it.

name: Soldier Feng
greeting: I have General Summer's order to protect this place.

name: Refugee
greeting: Angler's Village has been consumed by war. All of Widow's Coast has already been deserted.

name: Swiftwind Commander
greeting: The advent of the Wraiths has brought disaster to our peaceful plains.

name: Sumor Camp Chief
greeting: I am the Sumor Camp Chief.

name: Merchant Lo Zhan
greeting: No one would suspect that the now desolate Sumor Camp used to be a beautiful place.

name: Swiftwind Prophet
greeting: As a prophet, I have seen many things that I cannot speak of. I often see the horrible things that have happened to my people. They are depressing visions, indeed.

name: Blacksmith Mo Yun
greeting: All our warriors are fighting the Wraith while the children and elderly are left in the village.

name: Swiftwind Recluse
greeting: If your ideas are accepted by the times and by society, you should take on the responsibilities that you can take; if they aren't accepted, you would be better off to stay alone and strengthen yourself gradually.

name: Guard Chi
greeting: Every region in Perfect World has been invaded except Heaven's Tear. For that, you can thank the gods.

name: Guard Lu Zhang
greeting: I must be careful.

name: Swiftwind Elder
greeting: I have faith that our chief can lead us to victory.

name: Swiftwind Warrior
greeting: They are so strong.

name: Swiftwind Chief
greeting: Did you know that the Swiftwind Tribe once ruled the entire world? Oh, how I miss those glorious days!

name: A Man's Body
greeting: A corpse lies on the ground. It appears to be a man's body.

name: Destruction Seal
greeting: "In the name of the gods, we seal the ancient devil of Destruction here."

name: Chaos Seal
greeting: "In the name of the gods, we seal the ancient devil Chaos here."

name: Redglow the Taoist
greeting: For all living creatures in the world, if they don't start with the Tao, they must end with it.

name: Hsu Hsiako
greeting: Trust a traveler's intuition. There is a dangerous plot overtaking this land.

name: Evilbuster Stone
greeting: A quadrate stone, which looks quite ordinary.

name: Grave of a Lady
greeting: A small grave.

name: Old Soldier
greeting: Staring out at the sea, I can forget all that troubles me.

name: Foreign Monk
greeting: Looking for exotic wares? Come see me.

name: Hsing the Thief
greeting: As people say, "Steal a wallet and you are a thief, snatch a country and you are a king." Just look at the well dressed, beautiful people. Actually they are the real thieves.

name: Arrowhead Manor Host
greeting: I can't just sit around and do nothing in these turbulent times. No one is here because I sent them out to fight against the Wraith.

name: Dreamweaver Port Merchant
greeting: I miss my family.

name: Weak Prisoner
greeting: I don't regret what I did, but I want to be a good person from now on.

name: Savage Native
greeting: My people have gone against the teachings of those who have come before us. Why have my people allowed their reputation to be sullied?

name: Mu Lan
greeting: Lots of people died in the earthquake and our home was ruined. What have we done to anger the gods?!

name: Hai Sheng
greeting: This island is a pretty good place to live, don't you think?

name: Little Hsiu
greeting: Grandpa is gone and I don't know where he is. He promised me he'd make me some wings. I guess I'll just wait for him here.

name: Master Tsang
greeting: This is a beautiful place. I've only been here for a month, but I never want to leave.

name: Flowing Cloud
greeting: My sister and I drifted here with nothing. I'm afraid we will have to leave soon.

name: Ancestors' Stele
greeting: There is a strange character written on the stele.

name: Pao Yu
greeting: My teacher said, "More haste, less speed."

name: Exiled Lands Guard
greeting: Seeing a friend die in front of my eyes, unable to be saved... How can I sleep at night?

name: Waning Moon
greeting: Our ship was destroyed by a sea monster. Now we have only ourselves to depend on.

name: Hsun the Elder
greeting: I won't leave until Susa has recovered.

name: Winged Elf Tsui
greeting: We must stay here because we have no alternative. But why have you come?

name: Blacksmith Mo
greeting: These days, everyone should carry a good weapon.

name: Bud Harvester
greeting: One day, when I've saved enough money, my daughter and I will go far away from this place.

name: Merchant Chang
greeting: I didn't foresee such a disaster befalling the Fortress of the Talon. Most of my goods have been lost. I'm ruined!

name: Talon Member Chao
greeting: We will reconstruct Fortress of the Talon ourselves.

name: Secret Chest of the Talon
greeting: An iron chest is fixed to the ground with layers of dust on it.

name: Member of the Talon
greeting: That horrible night... The Fortress of the Talon was burned to the ground... Please, I don't want to think about it! (Sobs uncontrollably)

name: Guard Hsiung
greeting: Lots of monsters suddenly appeared in the Dragon Wilderness recently.

name: Guard Hu Hsiao
greeting: To protect the tribe, that is the duty of the guards.

name: Sundown Town Elder

name: Orphan Hong

name: Daffodil

name: Guard Sun

name: Hsiang the Archer

name: PW Promotions Agent
greeting:
Welcome to Perfect World International!
Got an issue? Submit a ticket at https://support.perfectworld.com/ or use our Live Chat feature. Live Chat is only available Monday - Friday 10:00 - 19:00 Pacific Time.

name: Hsu Hsian
greeting: This bridge holds a special place in my heart...

name: Hsuhsien's Son
greeting: The spirit of my mother still lingers in that tower...

name: Miss Cloud
greeting: This world would be much better off without day or night.

name: Muyu
greeting: If only we were like the verdant trees and could stay together forever.

name: Elder Yuan
greeting: How do you like it here, youngster?

name: Antique Dealer
greeting: Welcome! The best merchandise ain't cheap.

name: Chang Te
greeting: Nothing is better than the gathering of a whole family.

name: Little Boy
greeting: Life is indeed too short. But would a longer life be much different?

name: Hsuan Yao
greeting: I have some rare esoterica here.

name: Brilliance
greeting: I preside over the trigram Chien.

name: Winged Elf Tseng
greeting: I preside over the trigram Kun.

name: Leo E. Chi
greeting: I preside over the trigram Ken.

name: Hooligan Kuo
greeting: I preside over the trigram Kan.

name: Winged Elf Han
greeting: I preside over the trigram Li.

name: Morning Flower
greeting: I preside over the trigram Tui.

name: Miss Tso
greeting: I preside over the trigram Hsun.

name: Tsang Tien
greeting: I preside over the trigram Chen.

name: Little Fang
greeting: Though it is beautiful, the peach blossom is a simple flower.

name: Wine Merchant
greeting: Ooh...that was scary. I wish I had a cup of wine to settle me down.

name: Shop Assistant
greeting: Welcome! I sell the best wine in Perfect World!

name: Guard Chieh
greeting: Keep quiet!

name: Guard Kai
greeting: Behave yourself here!

name: Foreigner
greeting: (You don't understand the language this man is speaking)

name: Chinese Chess Player
greeting: This misery was brought upon myself by me alone.

name: Crippled Solider
greeting: How can anybody understand the warriors who are fighting for their homes...

name: Pai Li the Painter
greeting: If I could produce but one masterpiece, that would be enough...

name: Master of Yin-Yang
greeting: The sorrow and pain of the dead cannot be understood by the living.

name: Tough Man Tiehi
greeting: Twenty years ago, when I first moved here with my family, these lands were wild and natural.

name: Misfortunate Poet
greeting: Be quiet! My inspiration is at stake here.

name: Iron Axe Chang
greeting: I love my iron axe!

name: Elder Huo
greeting: This land has never been blessed by God and it never will be. After discovering what the Wraiths are, how can we continue to believe in any god?

name: Young Man Hsiao
greeting: Be careful, and sail.

name: Wraith Hunter
greeting: Never underestimate the Wraiths.

name: Grave Robber
greeting: I was here earlier than you so find yourself another grave on which to start your work.

name: General Tuyan
greeting: I will not let the Wraiths destroy Dreamweaver Port.

name: Miss Yun
greeting: I never believed their lies about beautiful women.

name: Great Scholar
greeting: As a scholar, I have never stopped reading books. Yes, reading books...

name: Elder Po Le
greeting: See those fools waving their so-called swords? To me, those are just bars of iron.

name: Dreamweaver Elder
greeting: My only wish is for my people to survive the impending attacks.

name: Injured Soldier
greeting: I want to fight, but I can't change anything by myself.

name: Crazed Sailor
greeting: Corpses...there are moving corpses on that island! My comrades all died, and then their corpses just stood up and started marching...

name: Naturalist
greeting: War has caused the extinction of many of this land's beasts.

name: Husband of Tinglan
greeting: The monsters are growing more and more. They are everywhere now! I must report to the chief.

name: Lady Tinglan
greeting: I've never seen a person like you. You must be from somewhere outside the desert.

name: Young Father Cho
greeting: I will do whatever I can for my son.

name: Chief of Cromagnon
greeting: We share a common origin with Sandsong Village. Due to recent misunderstandings, we haven't had any communication with them for a long time. I know that both of our villages wish to reconcile but we are both too prideful to be the ones to speak out first.

name: Strongman Sang
greeting: We are not feeling good about the happenings outside our village.

name: Strongman Yan
greeting: We must have an idea about the situation.

name: Strongman Anpang
greeting: I will never forget what my father taught me.

name: Sandsong Village Elder
greeting: Strong wind, sandstorm, and monsters...Please take care when you are traveling around here.

name: Lady Meng
greeting: There is always someone waiting for you, Ling Feng...

name: Expedition Member
greeting: Talk to our captain, Pai Chiong, if you need anything.

name: Ping Juyan
greeting: I tried to forget him, but I couldn't. The more I tried, the harder it was.

name: Chun Shen
greeting: Could you help us with some problems?

name: Kutao the Adventurer
greeting: Interested in finding treasure? We can cooperate to find some!

name: Mister Meng
greeting: Secrets and treasures hide in the glacier, but great danger does as well.

name: Pai Chiong
greeting: I hope we can be lucky enough to find the treasure.

name: Mr. Tungku
greeting: Walk your own way. Pay no attention to what they say.

name: Yeh
greeting: If I could be a warrior, I would definitely fight the Wraiths as bravely as I could.

name: Ma the Ordinary
greeting: Don't listen to the gossip of those boring villagers, they have always envied me, you know.

name: Wife of Mutieh
greeting: When can we ease the pain of the burning heat?

name: Little Chiang
greeting: Stay away...stay away from me...

name: Fang Fan
greeting: The ancient elemental creatures are walking on this land again. How is this possible?

name: Good Old Chang
greeting: I will help my master with the investigation on those mysterious element creatures.

name: Leader of Immolation
greeting: We've been tortured by the heat for too long, and the volcano's recent eruption has made it even worse.

name: Soldier Tsao
greeting: Had the Elders dispatched the army in a timely manner then General Wan might still be with us.

name: Archosaur Mailman
greeting: I really can't finish my mission with such injuries.

name: Kufeng the Elder
greeting: How can the Elders take no actions toward the impending Wraith Army?

name: The Cloud Walker
greeting: I stride alone, like an eagle in the sky.

name: Miss Chiu
greeting: It's the same peach blossom. But the person who was under the tree has gone...

name: Miss Ming
greeting: I feel the wind is stronger than before.

name: Lei Wanchun
greeting: All heroes are eventually forgotten. Such is the fate of those who exist only within the memory of men.

name: Wen Hsih
greeting: Life is just like chess. If you don't make a move, you can never move.

name: Taoist Ching
greeting: You wanna know the truth?

name: Taoist Chih
greeting: Don't carry the weight of the world on your shoulders, right buddy?

name: Taoist Kui
greeting: Never try to make formulas for the world. Such complexity cannot be analyzed by the minds of men.

name: Elder of the Streams
greeting: Will the Gods bring salvation or doom? I wonder...

name: Chih Hua
greeting: There is nothing stable about fame. Try to make a position for yourself without relying on the opinions of others.

name: Kenisha
greeting: Love is like a maze in which one wanders around their whole life, trying to find their way out.

name: Winged Elf Lung
greeting: Cherish your life since every moment is precious.

name: Teleport Master Chi
greeting: Where would you like to go?  I can have you there in the blink of an eye.

name: Banker Han
greeting: You can store your money in my bank.

greeting: There will always be foolish people who make the wrong decisions in life. That they err is not entirely their fault, but rather it is because they cannot foresee the effects of different choices that they fail.

name: Apothecary Chien
greeting: I wish there was no sickness in the world, even though that would mean the end of my profession.

name: Blacksmith Huo
greeting: You wanna know the story of the sword?

greeting: Ornaments let others know your status in life.

name: Demon Envoy of Justice

name: Archosaur Veteran
greeting:
Alright everyone, back to work!
The Spring Festival is over!
No more fireworks in Archosaur!  I'll trade you for any remaining firecrackers you have. 
I don't want to see any more fires being started!
Obey the laws or suffer the same fate as me!

name: Blabber Mouth

name: Doofy
greeting: I'm sorry but I really can't store anymore.

name: Aerogear Forge
greeting: Use this forge to upgrade the speed of your aerogear purchased from the Boutique! Upgrading requires Wind Widgets which can be found in the Boutique under Fly > Upgrades. To upgrade, drag your aerogear and Wind Widgets into the window and select Start.

name: Merchant Chief Lu
greeting: Oh, my dear friend! How are you doing? Are you... I don't mean to be rude, but you are a bit odd. I have this feeling that you are not one of this world. Well, I don't think that matters. We merchants are very neutral people. What can I do for you?

name: Traveling Vendor Po
greeting: A good reputation is the most important thing for a merchant. Whoever you are, here you will find the best service you have ever experienced.

name: Blacksmith Tieh
greeting: It is well known that I carry the finest gear in Perfect World. But I do things differently here. Do you know about our special "currency"? Yes, yes, Wraithcore. If you have enough Wraithcore, you can trade with me for what you want. Quite simple, eh?

name: Banker Hu
greeting: One earns a lot, then pays a lot. Actual money never exists. Money is quite meaningless... Oops! Haha.. Just kidding! Trust me, your money and items will be safe in my bank.

name: Traveling Apothecary Che
greeting: Through the study of the herb's functions, longevity can be achieved.

name: Scout Captain Shah
greeting: Only the enemy's blood shall wash away our hatred.

name: Wiseman Pai
greeting: Blind obsession leads people into all kinds of tragedies. Human and Winged Elves are all prisoners of the passions.

greeting: Hey, stranger. What the... why am I seeing two heads on your shoulder?

name: Guard Futou
greeting: I will not let the Winged Elves pass!

name: Whitewing Leader Tsu
greeting: Why are we suffering this blasphemous disaster? It was the dirty slander of the filthy Humans! It must be them!

name: Guard Yao
greeting: I can't tolerate those impudent Humans any more! Let us drive them from this land!

name: Guard Chien
greeting: I don't know who is right or wrong. All I know is that the Humans are slaughtering our people.

file_model: Models\NPCs\怪物\07地行灵\女鬼\a身高\叶影怨魂.ecm

name: Guard Tienhsao
greeting: Greetings, friend. You are now at the transit depot of time and space, where you will encounter different powers of different times. The worlds here are definitely different from the ones you've been to. Ask me if you want to know anything.

name: Guard Tienli
greeting: It is my honor to guard this place.

name: Chrono Sneaker
greeting: For the honor of my race, I will fulfill my quest.

name: Soul Cleansing Forge
greeting: The strange forge is emitting a strong disgusting smell.

greeting: I don't see anything optimistic in the future of the Allied Force.

name: Sentinel Yi
greeting: I am risking my life standing here.

name: Sentinel Ping
greeting: Will you move a bit? You are blocking my sight.

name: Encampment Guard
greeting: War can never be a thing to enjoy...

name: Encampment Guard
greeting: I guess to die on the battlefield is my sole destiny.

name: Alliance Marshal Tieh
greeting: I don't think you understand my worries.

name: Chief Wizard Po
greeting: Those brutal Savagians have caused me much trouble! What are those naturally anti-magic animals?

name: Chief Staff Officer Hsu
greeting: Things should've gone better. I hold myself wholly responsible for our current situation.

name: Alliance General Pi
greeting: We must have the confidence and the will of iron, otherwise we will lose all hope.

greeting: I am ready to sacrifice my life at any time. But I hope I will finish my mission before that...

greeting: After having traveled through time, you will find that you can still do nothing about the past...

name: Pearl
greeting: |Idol Contest|我就是人见人爱花见花开的党明珠！每天早上11点，我都会在你们之间选择一个代理人，负责帮我招募后援团！至于代理人的条件嘛……很简单，只要给我10亿完美币就OK啦！怎么？嫌多啊？也不是不能商量啊，从早上11点开始，每隔10分钟，我就会主动降低一次代理费用，总共降低12次，最后的价格是50万完美币！不想说了，到了这个价格就是挥泪割肉跳楼吐血大甩卖啊！不过这个代理人，一天只有一个，如果你想等到最便宜的时候才下决定，很可能有人在你前面就付钱咯！我可是认钱不认人的！

name: Chiah the Dancer
greeting:
Maybe I'm suitable only for such stage. 
I would open my heart, and build my own miracles on the stage for nobody else. The beautiful loneliness here is for me to taste, while the solitary dance of eternity is for me to take.

name: N/A竞选_A组_10W级别充值和投票任务隐形怪
Celestial Messenger
greeting: So you think your squad has mastered this dungeon? Give ^0184ffTrophy Mode^ffffff a try! You'll be scored based on what you kill and how fast you finish. At the end, your squad will be graded and rewarded according to your overall performance.

name: Litsong
greeting: Come, let's see what you have won. Be careful, ^fffd44you'll have only 1 minute to fetch your award.

name: Insularum Janitor
greeting: Be grateful to be, because I'm the one to let you enter Nubium Valley.

name: Nubium Janitor
greeting: Do you want to return to Insularum Valley? It's for free!

name: Shahua
greeting: How can the time be stopped if I don't sigh?

name: Inventory Master
greeting: If you're looking for more inventory or bank slots, you're at the right place.

name: Meeting Stone
file_model: Models\NPCs\怪物\32物品妖\墓碑怪\贤者墓碑.ecm
greeting: Looking for some help with this dungeon?

name: Wehnia's Ghost
file_model: Models\NPCs\怪物\07地行灵\女鬼\c身高\彩衣亡魂.ecm
greeting: I'm just a passer-by to this world. I have come from the nothingness, and will return to the emptiness.

name: Tsufong the Wanderer
greeting: A road too difficult for a man to travel... What can I do now?

name: Wygie (Barbarian)
greeting:
Only an LV85+ Barbarian can summon Infernal Sonikbeast with the Invitation of Purgatory here.
^ff9c00To summon it again, you have to reset the instance after you have defeated it.

name: Wygie (Cleric)
greeting:
Only an LV85+ Cleric can summon Bloodsurge Ultera with the Invitation of Purgatory here.
^ff9c00To summon it again, you have to reset the instance after you have defeated it.

name: Wygie (Archer)
greeting:
Only an LV85+ Archer can summon Knight of Terror with the Invitation of Purgatory here.
^ff9c00To summon it again, you have to reset the instance after you have defeated it.

name: Wygie (Venomancer)
greeting:
Only an LV85+ Venomancer can summon Lunaweaver - Crimson and Lunaweaver - Darkness with the Invitation of Purgatory here.
^ff9c00To summon it again, you have to reset the instance after you have defeated it.

name: Wygie (Wizard)
greeting:
Only an LV85+ Wizard can summon Foretoken Bearer with the Invitation of Purgatory here.
^ff9c00To summon it again, you have to reset the instance after you have defeated it.

name: Wygie (Blademaster)
greeting:
Only an LV85+ Blademaster can summon the Herald of Agony with the Invitation of Purgatory here.
^ff9c00To summon it again, you have to reset the instance after you have defeated it.

name: Snowman Tamer
greeting: I can not tame this many snowmen by myself. Who can help me?

name: Snowman Tamer
greeting: I can not tame this many snowmen by myself. Who can help me?

name: Snowman Tamer
greeting: I can not tame this many snowmen by myself. Who can help me?

name: Snowman Tamer
greeting: I can not tame this many snowmen by myself. Who can help me?

name: Saint Valentine
greeting: Do you smell that? That is the smell of Love in the air. Or maybe I haven't showered in a while. I can't be too sure.

name: Arena Teleporter
greeting: Keep your fears to yourself, but share your courage with others.

name: Saint Valentine
greeting: Wish everyone in love happy forever!

name: Miss Lotus
file_model: Models\NPCs\怪物\35人战士\花苞疯女\花苞疯女.ecm

name: N/A09情人节_夫妻_漂流莲花灯1
greeting:
Lit a lotus lantern
Read a piece of poem
Fades away all the words
Comes back the dreams

name: COF Lotto Agent
greeting: I am the agent of the Cube of Fate Lotto Committee. If you have any question, feel free to ask me!

name: Cube of Fate Shrong
file_model: Models\NPCs\怪物\35人战士\力士\力士30%缩.ecm
greeting: As a member of the Cube of Fate Director's Board, I feel so proud of myself! I am Shrong. Who are you?

name: Cube of Fate Trong
file_model: Models\NPCs\怪物\35人战士\力士\力士30%缩.ecm
greeting: Wherever there is money, I show up! I heard that there is a newly spotted continent to the east...I am considering investing some money there you know? Help start it up!

name: Cube of Fate CEO
file_model: Models\NPCs\怪物\35人战士\力士\力士30%缩.ecm
greeting: The organization in the Cube of Fate is complicated. There is a directors' board, a principle committee, a residential administration, a Cube of Fate CEO fans league....guess which department I am in.

name: Lucky Cube Game Agent
greeting: Now, I'm in charge of the Lucky Cube Game! If you want to challenge Room #60, give me your invitation! Meanwhile, feel free to leave.

name: Furtive Speculator
greeting:
My business is obscure! It feels so hard to hide from everyone!
One chance for each and there are only 500 in my stock! The faster, the more possible you buy from me!

name: Watcher of the Earth
greeting: There are elements in the world! They belong to their relative owners. If you want to use their power, you have to train yourself hard!

name: Watcher of the Sky
greeting: God grants me power and growth, as well as the responsibility to keep the balance of the Elements.

name: Warsong Gatekeeper
greeting: You will need great courage to enter the Warsong City.

name: Glowing Moon
greeting: I am too tired to walk anymore.

name: Turnan
greeting: At the source of the stream where the Peach Blossoms bloomed lived a group of leeches.

name: Clearstream
greeting: I would gladly give my own life to save the lives of other people.

name: Blazing Star
greeting: Help! I need help!

name: Dancing Melody
greeting: This tranquil melody sways my body and calms my nerves. It drives me to dance all day and all night.

name: Clearstream's Incarnation·Wood
greeting: Help me!

name: Clearstream's Incarnation·Water
greeting: Help me!

name: Clearstream's Incarnation·Metal
greeting: Help me!

name: Clearstream's Incarnation·Fire
greeting: Help me!

name: Clearstream's Incarnation·Earth
greeting: Help me!

name: Ginring
greeting:
The sad melody of the Warsong has sounded. The dawn has come but hope still shines bright.
You cannot face the evil yourself. Speak to me if you are the leader of a strong squad.

name: Mr.19th
file_model: Models\NPCs\怪物\15蛮族战士\三苗野人\a身高\三苗野人杂工.ecm
greeting: Believing in me, is believing in the truth.

name: Test Crystal
file_model: Models\NPCs\怪物\07地行灵\九子鬼母\九子鬼母.ecm
greeting: Brave warrior! There is a time limit for every boss fight. Complete the quest in time or I will be killed! Please help me!

name: Elder
greeting: The army of Archosaur is no more. It is now up to young ones like yourself to protect us.

name: Elder
greeting: Strange things are happening all over. There must be someone or something behind it all.

name: Elder
greeting: For thousands of years, our history has been dominated by brutal wars with the Humans and Winged Elves. In order to avoid mutual extinction, we are now at peace.

name: Head Hunter
greeting: Heroes! I'm looking for heroes to hire! Do you think you can handle the job?

name: Kwan Zhu
greeting: I can take you places! Many places! Or only one place. It's up to you! The bridge is out! You'll have to find another way.

name: Yuan Zo
greeting: Why am I the one stuck on this side with this thing???

name: Head Hunter
greeting: Heroes! I'm looking for heroes to hire! Do you think you can handle the job?

name: Head Hunter
greeting: Heroes! I'm looking for heroes to hire! Do you think you can handle the job?

name: Head Hunter
greeting: Heroes! I'm looking for heroes to hire! Do you think you can handle the job?

name: Head Hunter
greeting: Heroes! I'm looking for heroes to hire! Do you think you can handle the job?

name: Lin Yan
greeting: It's dangerous to go alone. I'll only open the gates for you if you're the leader of a squad.

name: Yi Lam
greeting: My money will never be spent for nothing.

name: Shiner Nin
greeting: Please, help me!

name: Celestial Sister
greeting: Everything is in the void of chaos.

name: Lin Yan
greeting: It's dangerous to go alone. I'll only open the gates for you if you're the leader of a squad.

name: Celestial Sister
greeting: Everything is in the void of chaos.

name: Vanguard Isis
greeting: Welcome! Listen to me, for I have much to teach you while you take your first few steps in this world.

name: Dragonfang Messenger
file_model: models\npcs\npc\影族将军\影族将军传令官.ecm
greeting: This is where your trials will take place. Pass these tests, and you will become much more powerful. The messengers in each camp will guide you. In addition, there are many places of note on this island, so make sure to explore.

name: Laid-back Old Man
greeting: One day in the future you might want to ask yourself if all this was worth doing. It is better to ask yourself this than to not do it and always wonder about it. Anyways kid, you'll never know these things unless you go out there and do it yourself.

name: Netherspring Messenger
file_model: models\npcs\npc\影族将军\影族将军传令官.ecm
greeting: You can't call yourself a warrior until you have experienced the horrors of war firsthand! The trials of this islands are only your first step.

name: Guard Lumane
greeting: This island we are standing on was once the most rich and beautiful place in the oceans. Though during the war against the Nightspike race, this place has been totally devastated. You will never want to experience that again.

name: Blacksmith Dmitrii
greeting: It is said that beyond the tides there is a continent. I wonder who makes the better weapon, the blacksmiths there, or me?

name: Apothecary Trison
greeting: Bee honey, scorpion venom, worm flesh, clamshell... arrgh! What is the last ingredient?

name: Amethyst Village Messenger
file_model: models\npcs\npc\影族将军\影族将军传令官.ecm
greeting: You have come! I am glad you have made it! Well, the situation is not good here. Let's see what I can do for you.

name: Guard Zhenya
greeting: If I could catch that thief, I would crush his skull.

name: Meditating Shaman
greeting: I wish I could reach as far as the horizon!

name: Short-Tail Lochmur
file_model: Models\NPCs\怪物\影族资料片\鱼人\鱼人武士.ecm
greeting: Don't panic! Though I am a Lochmur, and appear as a monster to those of your race, I mean no harm. I was cast out by my clan.

name: Tailor Echo
greeting: My ancestors were some of the best at crafting armor. However, the technique to make fine scale armor was lost during my grandfather's generation. It's a shame to lose such a great technique!

name: Nightfire Messenger
file_model: models\npcs\npc\影族将军\影族将军传令官.ecm
greeting: I have a bad feeling that something might happen! Hope it is just my speculation.

name: Master Assassin Galewing
file_model: models\npcs\npc\影族刺客大师\影族刺客大师.ecm
greeting: The Galewing union gathers the most skillful killers! I can train those without the natural assassin skills, but honestly I don't think they'd be able to handle the training.

name: Master Voodooist Shaar
greeting: Thousands of years ago, the human races who floated here from the far end of the oceans taught us the art of magic. Our ancestors adapted their magic with our voodoo spirit, thus we are called voodooist now.

name: Guard Bulbeyes
greeting: Where are you from? What are you doing here? I will keep a watch on you whenever you go!

name: Liaison Officer Kwong
greeting: Hello, I am the Liaison Officer here, and in charge of the contracting jobs between the mines and the City of Raging Tides. What business do you have here?

name: Shipping Officer Chiang
greeting: If we leave those monsters out here, they will eventually cut our contact with the city. We better call for backup!

name: Apothecary Trone
greeting: The monsters out there are quite ferocious these days! They used to be softer.

name: Master Psychic Sasha
greeting: You have no idea how many bones are buried beneath these oceans. No matter how strong you are, you will never survive the cruelty of nature.

name: Master Assassin Flinge
file_model: Models\NPCs\npc\影族刺客大师\影族刺客大师.ecm
greeting: This ocean, this island, they are our homeland! I won't let those stupid Lochmur and Nightspike ravage it!

name: Guard Autumnland
greeting: In this place, where we are standing on, thousands of distinguished warriors have spilled their blood for the peace of our people! I can help eliminating those filther nightspikes!

name: Tailor Beautifull
greeting: I have two "l"s in my name, so you have to make it longer when you are calling my name.

name: Apothecary Windcandle
greeting: Though I am old, you can count on me when you need medical treatments.

name: Merchant Blink
greeting: Cheap goods! Top quality!

name: Wave Breaker Messenger
file_model: models\npcs\npc\影族将军\影族将军传令官.ecm
greeting: I am less strict with those who prove themselves.

name: Apothecary Wiese
greeting: Who can remind me of my past?

name: Tideborn Hermit
greeting: The ocean spirits have been haunting this island for over 3,000 years. There must be something very wrong with this place.

name: Guard Hezus
greeting: I am in charge of the people of this village. Don't distract me from my duty!

name: Blacksmith Ilya
greeting: No one here can even imagine what life is like on that distant continent. I wonder how much different it is over there...

name: Tailor Nika
greeting: Our armor manufacturing techniques have been passed down for thousands of years.  However, we couldn't keep up with the demand, and now foreign goods from distant places have started to enter our markets.

name: Merchant Sumuil
greeting: You have no idea how many bones are buried beneath those oceans. If you are not strong enough, you can never survive the tortures of nature.

name: Craftsman Betep
greeting: Though I am merely a craftsman these days, I was once a skilled assassin.

name: Apothecary Tekla
greeting: It is not easy to identify herbs. Without years of practice, you are bound to make mistakes.

name: Elder
greeting: Nightspikes lurk outside. If we are not careful, they will once again become threats to us.

name: Lone Obelisk
file_model: models\npcs\npc\完美破损石碑\完美破损石碑.ecm
greeting: A ruined obelisk which stands in the water alone. That looks weird.

name: Guard Lindon
greeting: Faithful to our people! Eliminate any threats for them!

file_model: models\npcs\npc\影族钱庄老板\影族钱庄老板.ecm

greeting: I serve the owner of this territory only.

greeting: I will retaliate against anyone that harms our land. However, I do not wish to get into any wars.

name: Psychic Coordinator Shay
greeting: The way of the Psychic is worthy of your life's devotion. Are you here to further your training?

name: Priest Konchi

greeting: Age is of no concern to me. I am more powerful than I ever was! With my strength, the Tideborn shall prevail!

name: Bookmerchant Sierray
greeting: I was the first outland merchant to come here....however, the Tideborns seem not interested in books.

name: Teleporter Reviero

The teleporters are all over Perfect World, and of course there is one here.
If you are below level 20, I can teleport you for free to the Island of Broken Dreams or Dragonfang Village.

greeting: I am busy healing those wounded soldiers.

We will soon run out of resources.
If you have help us breakthourgh, I will give you a little reward.
By the way, if you have Tideborn Guardian Medals, bring them to me.

greeting: Manufacture new weaponry by combining Rapture Crystals with a Lunar Glade weapon. Forging these items will enhance the effectiveness of this weapon! If you are unsatisfied with the outcome, you may reforge the item at the cost of extra crystals.

greeting: Manufacture new armor by combining Uncanny Crystals with Lunar Glade armor. Forging these items will enhance the effectiveness of your armor! If you are unsatisfied with the outcome, you may reforge the item at the cost of extra crystals.

The sword is carried on my back, waiting to be drawn.
Courage is with me, and might is with me.
No fear to die. My ghost will fight on.

greeting: Who can help my Leon? I need help!

name: Mengkwei

name: N/A圣诞迎宾使
greeting: N/A听闻有圣诞老人自西方来，本欲亲自迎接，不想竟然有不知死活的一群怨灵劫匪将他绑走！我在此召集完美世界中的勇士们，击败城外的众多劫匪，救出圣诞老人！待事情完成之后，我想圣诞老人一定会根据你们付出努力的多少来发放圣诞礼物的。

name: N/A好奇的接引人
greeting:
N/A听闻西方有一神祗名为圣诞老人，贫僧常望见上一见，你们可别让我失望。咳咳，你总看这只老虎做什么？它和妖族的妖兽可没有半点联系，阿弥陀佛……
^00ffff切记，这是一个根据贡献度发放奖励的活动，杀死的怪物越多、找到的东西越多则贡献度越大。
另外，营救圣诞老人活动中的不同劫匪贡献度是不相同的。
如果你发现了圣诞老人在野外留下的东西也可以增加贡献度。
同时，帮助城外的建宁公主、孟非、寒修竹完成任务也可以增加贡献度。

name: N/A圣诞使者
greeting: N/A救救我，好心人。圣诞老人被抓走之后，我也被囚禁在笼子里了，只有击败所有的劫匪小头目我们才可以重获自由。作为回报，在我们出来之后一定会为你们增强实力的。

name: N/A圣诞使者
greeting: N/A想不到还能重见天日，为了表达我的感谢，我将为你们奉献出圣诞节的祝福。等你们被祝福之后，尽最大努力去营救圣诞老人吧！

name: Sage Assassin Faye
file_model: models\npcs\npc\影族刺客大师\影族刺客大师.ecm
greeting: I master the secret skills of Assassin.

name: Sage Psychic Farrin
greeting: There is no end in the path of training.

name: Demon Assassin Burro
file_model: models\npcs\npc\影族刺客大师\影族刺客大师.ecm
greeting: Your blade is your only companion.

name: Demon Psychic Shain
greeting: The power of demons can make you stronger.

name: Elder of Astral Light
greeting: Although science can explain much of this world to us, there are some things that even science can't explain.

name: Treasure Guide
greeting: I don't believe you understand me!

name: Treasure Guide Assisstant
file_model:
Models\NPCs
pc
pc影族少年男
pc影族少年男.ecm
greeting: My master told me not to talk to strangers...You don't have a tickets, so you are a stranger.

name: Treasure Guide Assisstant
greeting: Don't let the chance scoot.

name: Monk of Lunar
greeting: There are so many difficulties in the Lunar Glade. Countless warriors have died here. Since now you are here, I can send you directly to Humorum Valley.

name: Beast Killer
greeting:
There is a legend about a relic that contains enough power to command all the armies in the world.
However, it's been lost for hundreds of years, and nobody knows where it is.

name: Keeper of the Tigers
greeting:
We are in need of brave warriors to restore peace to the land by defeating the Celestial Tigers.
^ff0000To qualify for a reward, you must gain 2,000 Contribution points. Players with less than 2,000 Contribution points will not be given a reward.

name: Etherlord of Fortune
greeting:
Starting today until April 14th, I will be giving out free gifts every night from 19:00 to 20:00!
Don't let this opportunity pass you by!

name: Conversion Executor
greeting:
Many believe that it is impossible to change who you are. I, however, know that you can become a Sage or a Demon in just one blink of the eye. All you need to do is bring me a Celestial Schism.
^ff0000But first, you'll have to do something for me!

name: Jungle Guardian·Flore
file_model: Models\NPCs\怪物\11木元素\蝴蝶兰精\蝴蝶兰精.ecm
greeting: I am here guarding the piece of the crest.

name: Jungle Guardian·Glitter
file_model: Models\NPCs\怪物\10金元素\铁迅豹\a身高\戈壁铁豹.ecm
greeting: I am here guarding the piece of the crest.

name: Jungle Guardian·Flood
file_model: Models\NPCs\怪物\12水元素\寒冰公主\a身高\护卫冰晶.ecm
greeting: I am here guarding the piece of the crest.

name: Jungle Guardian·Spark
file_model: Models\NPCs\怪物\13火元素\烈焰红唇\a身高\飞天火精.ecm
greeting: I am here in the Scorching Cloister to protect the Shattered Jungle Crest.

name: Crest Forger
greeting: The Jungle Crest was shattered into five shards and scattered about. I've been waiting for someone to collect the five shards in order to reassemble the Crest. Please bring me as many shards as you can find.

name: Relic Keeper·Cutter
greeting: The jungle seems to be getting more and more crowded these days.

name: Relic Keeper·Polisher
greeting: You must be really strong! Most people can't reach this area.

name: Guide of the Ruins
greeting: Welcome to the Jungle Ruins, brave adventurer! Good luck on your treasure hunt！

name: Jungle Guardian·Mountain
file_model: Models\NPCs\怪物\14土元素\矿石怪\矿石怪_07生存_中.ecm
greeting: I'm just here to protect this Crest Shard.

name: Harbinger of Blessings
greeting: I am the keeper of the power that can make the key.

name: Ruin Altar
greeting: The gods only smile upon those who possess the sacred key.

name: Exit Pointer
greeting: If you don't want to leave, then why are you talking to me!

name: Father Derrial
greeting:
May the heavens bless you! 
Are you ready to get spend your lives together for all eternity?
Shhh... the wedding is about to start!

name: Trade Platform Agent
greeting: No trouble with me helping your business!

name: Champagne Tower
file_model: models\npcs\npc\香槟塔桌子\香槟塔桌子max.ecm
greeting: This champagne is not some cheap wine. You have to taste it using your whole heart! Please take a ^fffd44Wine Glass^ffffff from Alexander.

name: Wedding Cake
greeting: Mmm... It's so sweet and delicious! Please grab a ^fffd44Table Knife^ffffff from the Wedding Planner.

name: Wedding Planner
greeting: I'm the Wedding Planner, and I'm in charge of setting this place up. The groom can buy decorations and services from me. I have other services that the guests may find useful.
Please don't make me laugh! They'll fire me!

name: Trade Platform Administrator
greeting: No trouble with me helping your business!

name: Wedding Usher
greeting: Please take your corsage. Without it you can not participate in the wedding ceremony.

name: Japanese Celestial Harbinger
greeting: No one can see me cuz I am not supposed to be released in the US.

name: Chapel Guide
greeting: I will guide you to the perfect chapel.

name: Messenger of Time
greeting: If you are the chosen one, I shall open the Chrono Gate for you.

name: Spiritual Disciple
greeting: I can tell you how to get to the godless valley.

name: Wedding Planner
greeting: Welcome to the perfect chapel.

name: Wedding Usher
greeting: Welcome to the perfect chapel.

name: Faction Supervisor
greeting: Nobody is able to challenge the ancient dragon alone. So sound your battle trumpet, my hero! Summon the real fighters of the land, and let the heroes fight together!

name: Khoan the Survivor
greeting: Please, hero, you must help me. Time portals appeared in my homeland, and unleashed hordes of monsters.

name: Frostland Messenger of Time
greeting: This place isn't what it used to be...
